title: ChangeLog Revamp
description:
The app will show the changelog after being updated so the user can know what has changed.
This will be activated on the next update.

title: AutoSave & AutoLoad
description: You can activate this new option on Tools & Stuff - Quick Settings so your game is saved when you leave and it's automaticaly loaded when you came back. Only for RetroArch systems

title: DeckyControl
description:
New Decky Plugin to check EmuDecks controls for each Emulator while on game mode.
Install it from Tools & Stuff

title: New Parsers
description: Added support for the new parsers on Steam Rom Manager. Sameboy, PS1 on RPCS3, Sharp X68000,Commodore Vic-20,Commodore C16

title: Other Bug Fixes
description:
- Solved an issue that prevented RetroAchievements to work when the username / password contained special characters.
- Solved an issue with sudo passwords contaning special characters.
- Solved some fixes when launching Proton emulators.
- Added Progress Bar to Appimage & Binary updater.
- Fixed an issue that overwrote RetroArch configurations even when asking not to.
- Optimization of all images used on the AppImage so they take less space.
- New SRM page on Emulators Guides.
- SNES 8:7 Bezels fix
- DOSBox-pure legacy .conf support
- Option to prevent ESDE update
